description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Enter the space gladiator arena. Can you (and your friends) conquer all 13 battles and earn your freedom? Take on the role of a gladiator pilot who must overcome enemy ships, creatures, bosses, and deadly asteroids. Advance through the battles; upgrade your ship's speed, shields, life and more!  1-4 Players, 2-4 player co-op.
